QuestData.Title: We Need More Power
QuestData.Description:
Laurent's plan is a bit ambitious.
Mirrors are most reliable when used to traverse short distances. Traveling to the sanctuary will require a great deal of power, more than he or I have.
The shrouded have stores of anima in their compound. With enough of it, the mirror should be stable enough to get us where we need to go.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect anima from around The Shrouded Asylum.
